H0.text: The truck that starts moving first is faster, as determined by a class measuring the time each of two different trucks takes to drive across the parking lot.

H1.text: The truck that takes less time is faster, allowing a class measuring the time it takes each of two different trucks to drive across a parking lot to determine which truck is faster.

H2.text: The truck that has bigger tires is faster, as determined by measuring the time it takes for each truck to drive across the parking lot.

H3.text: The truck that takes more time is faster when determining which of two trucks is faster by measuring the time each takes to drive across the parking lot.
